description: HAL8000 MCP Server Registry - Available servers for selective loading

omnisearch.description: Multi-provider web search and content extraction (Brave, Tavily, Kagi, Exa, Firecrawl)

filesystem.description: Enhanced file system operations with batch reads and advanced search
filesystem.fallback: Read, Grep, Glob (100% functionality, slightly slower)

replicate.description: AI/ML model access via Replicate API (image generation, model inference, etc.)

context7.description: Upstash Context7 vector database for semantic context management and embeddings

notes.required_servers: Servers marked 'required: true' should remain enabled for core functionality
notes.environment: All API keys stored in single .env file in HAL8000 root directory
notes.token_cost: Each enabled MCP server costs approximately 500-1000 tokens on session boot
notes.selective_loading: Enable only servers needed for current session to optimize RAM usage
